title: Supermarket Vegan: 225 Meat-Free, Egg-Free, Dairy-Free Recipes for Real People in the Real World
description: Presents recipes and helpful preparation tips for vegetarian appetizers, soups, salads, main courses, and desserts that do not require meat, egg, or dairy substitutes.Title: Supermarket VeganAuthor: Klein, DonnaPublisher: Penguin Group USAPublication Date: 2010/01/05Number of Pages: 162Binding Type: PAPERBACKLibrary of Congress: 2009028030
author: Donna Klein
